name: GetGithubSecurityBillingInfo
description:
Retrieve GitHub Advanced Security billing details for an enterprise.

This tool retrieves data on active committers using GitHub Advanced Security for an enterprise, listed per repository. It provides information on the number of distinct user logins and the total repositories with committer information.

parameters.name: enterprise_identifier
parameters.description: The slug or ID representing the enterprise name for security billing info.

value_schema.description: The slug version of the enterprise name. You can also substitute this value with the enterprise id.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: The number of results per page to return. Maximum is 100.

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: results_page_number
parameters.description: Specify the page number of results to fetch. Use to navigate through paginated data.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

parameters.name: enterprise
parameters.description: The slug version of the enterprise name. You can also substitute this value with the enterprise id.

value_schema.description: The slug version of the enterprise name. You can also substitute this value with the enterprise id.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
